channel.title: Making New SHOPS HELP! It dosn't work!
channel.description:
Ok i made a new shop that sells white armor and rune armor. ;D
[code]shop = 19 Rebel's_Armor_Shop. 2 2 6623 5 6617 5 6625 5 6633 5 6621 5 6615 5 6627 5 6631 5 6619 10 6629 10 1163 2 1127 1 1079 2 1201 3 1093 3 1147 5 1185 2 1113 3[/code]
the npc who is suposed to sell it is a ghost shop keeper the autospawn is below [code] spawn = 1699 3031 3398 0 0 0 0 0 1 Armor Shop[/code]
Then i added this :rolleyes:
[code] } else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Ghost Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 19; //Armor Shop[/code]
But when i trade the Ghost shop keepe, it freezes, logs my account out then back in and dose nothing. What the heck is wrong with it??????????? :confused:
It is making me so mad! :mad:

@Lil_Brudder wrote:

Ok i made a new shop that sells white armor and rune armor. ;D

shop = 19	Rebel's_Armor_Shop.				2	2	6623	5	6617	5	6625	5	6633	5	6621	5	6615	5	6627	5	6631	5	6619	10	6629	10	1163	2	1127	1	1079	2	1201	3	1093	3	1147	5	1185	2	1113	3

the npc who is suposed to sell it is a ghost shop keeper the autospawn is below

spawn = 1699 3031 3398 0 0 0 0 0 1 Armor Shop

Then i added this :rolleyes:

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Ghost Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 19; //Armor Shop

But when i trade the Ghost shop keepe, it freezes, logs my account out then back in and dose nothing.
What the heck is wrong with it???

It is making me so mad! :mad:
